\section{func module}
\label{\detokenize{func:module-func}}\label{\detokenize{func:func-module}}\label{\detokenize{func::doc}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!func@\spxentry{func}}\index{func@\spxentry{func}!module@\spxentry{module}}\index{getFeatureNamesFromTFIDFVectorizer() (in module func)@\spxentry{getFeatureNamesFromTFIDFVectorizer()}\spxextra{in module func}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{func:func.getFeatureNamesFromTFIDFVectorizer}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{func.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{getFeatureNamesFromTFIDFVectorizer}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{arr}}}{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
This functions removes useless words from the text.

\sphinxAtStartPar
Convert a collection of raw documents to a matrix of TF\sphinxhyphen{}IDF features.
TF\sphinxhyphen{}IDF \textendash{}\textgreater{} TF \textendash{} term frequency, IDF \textendash{} inverse document frequency.
It is a numerical statistic that is intended to reflect how important a word is to a document.
\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters:}] \leavevmode\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{arr}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
An iterable which generates either str, unicode or file objects.

\end{description}\end{quote}

\item[{Returns:}] \leavevmode\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{featureNames}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
feature names from vectorizer\_dt got from texts basing on TF\sphinxhyphen{}IDF method

\item[{vectorizer\_dt}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
text array transformed to document\sphinxhyphen{}term matrix

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{description}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{get\_data() (in module func)@\spxentry{get\_data()}\spxextra{in module func}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{func:func.get_data}}

\pysigstopsignatures

\sphinxAtStartPar

\sphinxAtStartPar

\end{description}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{get\_important() (in module func)@\spxentry{get\_important()}\spxextra{in module func}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{func:func.get_important}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{func.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{get\_important}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{vocab}}}{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
This function gets only important words from the texts.
The important words(vocab) are searched in the texts.
The words are saved to the ‘temp’ array only if they exist in the provided data(texts).
\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters:}] \leavevmode\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{vocab}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
A list of important words (returned from permutationImportance() function)

\end{description}\end{quote}

\item[{Returns:}] \leavevmode\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{vectorizer\_dt}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
text array transformed to document\sphinxhyphen{}term matrix

\item[{featureNames}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
feature names from vectorizer\_dt got from texts basing on TF\sphinxhyphen{}IDF method

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{description}

\end{fulllineitems}

\section{metrics module}
\label{\detokenize{metrics:module-metrics}}\label{\detokenize{metrics:metrics-module}}\label{\detokenize{metrics::doc}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!metrics@\spxentry{metrics}}\index{metrics@\spxentry{metrics}!module@\spxentry{module}}\index{permutationImportance() (in module metrics)@\spxentry{permutationImportance()}\spxextra{in module metrics}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{metrics:metrics.permutationImportance}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{metrics.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{permutationImportance}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{model}}}{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
This functions calculates permutation importance for provided model.

\sphinxAtStartPar
Depending on using “takeXMostSignificantFeatures(impArray, namesArray, ss, numberOfFeatures=10)” or
“takeAllFeatures(impArray, namesArray, ss)” the essential data will be returned from this function.
\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters:}] \leavevmode\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{model}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
data model, for example svc(C\sphinxhyphen{}Support Vector Classifier fitted to training data)

\end{description}\end{quote}

\item[{Returns:}] \leavevmode\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{impArray}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
array containing the importance of each word

\item[{namesArray}] \leavevmode
\sphinxAtStartPar
array containing all words

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{description}

\end{fulllineitems}

\pysigstartsignatures
\pysigline{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{importance}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{\DUrole{w}{  }\DUrole{p}{=}\DUrole{w}{  }0.0}}}
\pysigstopsignatures
\end{fulllineitems}
